metaDescription: Every child deserves the gift of reading. Our reading specialists turn the sentiment into a reality.
heading: Every child deserves the gift of reading.
subHeading: Our reading specialists turn the sentiment into a reality.
headingCTA: Set Up A Free Consultation With Our Founder
description: Whether your child is just learning to read, struggling with a reading-based challenge like dyslexia, or fine-tuning a higher level comprehension skill, we can help your child make accelerated progress.
servicesLeftDesc: Every child's first session starts with a comprehensive literacy evaluation. We analyze the data to create a customized tutoring program, tailored to reflect your child's unique interests, strengths and needs. This evaluation is the cornerstone to our students' success.
servicesRightDesc: We take a systematic, targeted, and joyful approach when it comes to tutoring your child. Our techniques are research based and data driven, and we provide monthly progress reports to keep you in the loop! Plus, we come to you to provide an unparalleled in-home tutoring experience.
servicesCTA: Read More About Our Tutoring Services
specialistsDesc: Our tutors are Certified Literacy Specialists and Special Education teachers. They have been carefully selected to join our team of literacy experts.
testimonaialsLeftQuote: I sincerely believe that being introduced to Paul Tryon has altered the course of my son's life, and in turn, our family's life.
testimonaialsRightQuote: We will be forever grateful to both Paul and Alicia. We know it has changed Owen's view on school work, and he is now eager and loving to learn.
testimonaialsCTA: See What Everyoneâ€™s Saying About Us
contactTitle: Schedule a free phone consultation with our founder, Paul Tryon
